means: 粒细胞，粒性白细胞（细胞质中含有颗粒的一类白细胞）

word_mean: 粒细胞：任何含颗粒的细胞，尤指其胞浆中有嗜中性、嗜碱性、嗜酸性颗粒的白细胞。另见leukocyte项下的granular leukocytes和series项下的granular series

sentence.Network_en: Increase the neutrophilic granulocyte count after bone marrow transplantation.
sentence.Network_cn: 促进骨髓移植后中性粒细胞计数增加.

sentence.Network_en: Method: Ultrastructure in ovary granulocyte of menopausal rat was observed with optical microscope and electric microscope.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 采用更年期大鼠模型,应用光镜和电镜观察大鼠卵巢组织学变化和超微结构.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To investigate the cell source secreting the granulocyte granulocyte colony - stimulating factors ( GM - CSF , G - CSF ) in human placenta.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 确定脐血中高水平的造血因子的来源.

list.abs: 嗜碱性粒细胞（basophilic granulocyte）的突出特点是胞质内含粗大、大小分布不均、染成蓝紫色的嗜碱性颗粒。嗜碱性粒细胞颗粒 …

...消化降解的细胞称为吞噬细胞，又分为大、小吞噬细胞两类。大吞噬细胞指巨噬细胞(microphage)，小吞噬细胞指中性粒细胞(neutrophilic granulocyte)，又称多形核白细胞(polymorphonuclearleucocyte，PMN)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from late Latin granulum 'granule' + -cyte

means.word_mean: 1. a leukocyte that has granules in its cytoplasm
